statement.title: Problem Description
statement.content:
A hat��s word is a word in the dictionary that is the concatenation of exactly two other words in the dictionary.
You are to find all the hat��s words in a dictionary.

statement.title: Input
statement.content:
Standard input consists of a number of lowercase words, one per line, in alphabetical order. There will be no more than 50,000 words.
Only one case.

statement.title: Output
statement.content: Your output should contain all the hat��s words, one per line, in alphabetical order.

statement.title: Sample Input
statement.content:
a
ahat
hat
hatword
hziee
word
